data.title: Felix E. Feist
data.text:
grew up in and around Hollywood, his stepfather being Felix E. Feist.

Felix was born Felix Ellison Feist, not only was he a director, he was also a writer and producer.

The following is a list of the many TV and Movies he worked on.

Director Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea 6 episodes, 1964-1965 - The Enemies - 1965 TV Episode - The Amphibians - 1965 TV Episode - The Saboteur - 1965 TV Episode - The Indestructible Man - 1965 TV Episode - The Last Battle - 1965 TV Episode The Outer Limits 1 episode, 1965 - The Probe - 1965 TV Episode Bus Stop 1 episode, 1962 - Verdict of 12 - 1962 TV Episode Adventures in Paradise 17 episodes, 1960-1961 - The Closing Circle - 1961 TV Episode - Appointment at Tara-Bi - 1961 TV Episode - Beachhead - 1961 TV Episode - Errand of Mercy - 1961 TV Episode - Adam San - 1961 TV Episode Bonanza 1 episode, 1960 - Blood on the Land - 1960 TV Episode Riverboat 2 episodes, 1959 - A Night at Trapper's Landing - 1959 TV Episode - About Roger Mowbray - 1959 TV Episode The Deputy 1 episode, 1959 - Back to Glory - 1959 TV Episode The Californians 4 episodes, 1958-1959 - An Act of Faith - 1959 TV Episode - Dishonor for Matt Wayne - 1958 TV Episode - The Man from Paris - 1958 TV Episode - The Alice Pritchard Case - 1958 TV Episode The Texan 1958 TV Series unknown episodes Sea Hunt 1958 TV Series unknown episodes Tombstone Territory 1957 TV Series unknown episodes Zane Grey Theater 4 episodes, 1956-1957 - A Man on the Run - 1957 TV Episode - The Lariat - 1956 TV Episode - The Unrelenting Sky - 1956 TV Episode - The Long Road Home - 1956 TV Episode Highway Patrol 1 episode, 1957 - Gem Robbery - 1957 TV Episode Pirates of Tripoli 1955 Donovan's Brain 1953 The Man Behind the Gun 1953 Battles of Chief Pontiac 1952 This Woman Is Dangerous 1952 The Big Trees 1952 The Basketball Fix 1951 Tomorrow Is Another Day 1951 The Man Who Cheated Himself 1950 The Golden Gloves Story 1950 Guilty of Treason 1950 The Threat 1949 The Winner's Circle 1948 The Devil Thumbs a Ride 1947 George White's Scandals 1945 Reckless Age 1944 Pardon My Rhythm 1944 This Is the Life 1944 You're a Lucky Fellow, Mr. Smith 1943 All by Myself 1943 Dreams 1940 Golden Gloves 1940 Pound Foolish 1940 Prophet Without Honor 1939 Happily Buried 1939 Double Diving 1939 The 's Daughter 1938 What Do You Think? Number Two 1937 Decathlon Champion: The Story of Glenn Morris 1937 Give Till It Hurts 1937 The Romance of Digestion 1937 How to Be a Detective 1936 How to Vote 1936 Hollywood - The Second Step 1936 Hollywood Extra: The First Step 1936 Every Sunday 1936 Football Teamwork 1935 My Grandfather's Clock 1934 Strikes and Spares 1934 Deluge 1933 Football Footwork 1932 Writer Donovan's Brain 1953 screenplay Babes in Bagdad 1952 original screenplay Fixin' Fool 1951 The Golden Gloves Story 1950 screenplay The Devil Thumbs a Ride 1947 Happily Buried 1939 The Magician's Daughter 1938 story The Romance of Digestion 1937 uncredited How to Train a Dog 1936 My Grandfather's Clock 1934 screenplay Producer Peyton Place 1964 TV Series line producer unknown episodes The Californians 3 episodes, 1958-1959 - An Act of Faith - 1959 TV Episode producer - The Long Night - 1958 TV Episode producer - China Doll - 1958 TV Episode producer Reckless Age 1944 producer
